New Records: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer with two outs in the 10th inning
Key Match Events: The game went into extra innings with the score tied 2-2 in the third consecutive tight game in three nights at Progressive Field
Hunter Gaddis struck out Gleyber Torres and had Soto in a 1-2 count before Soto sent a towering shot over the wall in center
Pre-Game Insights: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said the team had done some'soul searching as an organization' during the winter after their 82-80, fourth-place finish in the AL East last season
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said he felt like he'd developed a great relationship with Juan Soto
Yankees third baseman Jazz Chisolm Jr. said he thought he joined a family when he joined the Yankees in a July trade from Miami
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Yankees advanced to their 41st World Series — and first in 15 years
The Yankees will try to win their 28th title against either the New York Mets or Los Angeles Dodgers
Cleveland just didn’t have enough and a surprising season under first-year manager Stephen Vogt ended just short of a World Series
Others: Giancarlo Stanton was named ALCS MVP as the Yankees took care of the Guardians in five games
The Yankees won the first two games at Yankee Stadium without much fanfare or any major drama
